DOC.detailed_description: An observational cross-sectional study carry aim determine association quality sleep harmful oral habit among child age three six year . This study conduct compliance Brazilian National Health Council/Ministry Health guideline contain Resolution 196/96 receive approval Human Research Ethics Committee Universidade Metropolitana de Santos ( Brazil ) process number 026/2010 . Parents/guardians participant properly inform regard objective study sign statement inform consent . Fifty child ( 3 6 year age ) private school city Sao Paulo evaluate mean two questionnaire administer parents/guardians : The `` Undesirable Habits Questionnaire '' , compose 15 investigative question harmful oral habit well dietary psychological factor , Sleep Habits Questionnaire.6 The data submit descriptive analysis . The chi-square test employ categorical variable analysis variance ( ANOVA ) carry compare mean value . The Student 's t-test use analysis , significance level set 5 % . The SPSS 12.0 program Windows use analyze result .
